name: BrainPower (itch) (Memorymatic)
description:
Brain Power is a Local Multiplayer Party Co-op game with asymmetric game play where three players play as minions helping each other to complete the minigames on each level. The fourth player controls the Brain and can therefore control the environment, with a laser turret shooting the minions, boxing gloves to punch them and fire traps to burn them! 

When the players start the game, they will customize their playable minion with different hairstyles and items on their back so they can play as the minion that reflects their own personality! The players will then take turns controlling the Brain and will get points based on how much damage they’re able to make. The other players will get points when completing a level, a task or picking up special cogwheels. In the end, only one will be the winner of the round! 

Grab a controller, and help your friends to face through a world full of chaotic rumble and have fun!

CONTROLS:

Main menu & character customization
Left stick: Move cursor
Right stick: Rotate character
Bottom face button (A/Cross): Press menu button/Add player
Left face button (X/Square): Change windup key
Upper face button (Y/Triangle): Change head ornament
Start: Start game

Minion
Left stick: Move
Bottom face button (A/Cross): Jump
Left face button (X/Square): Punch
Upper face button (Y/Triangle): Pick up/drop
Right face button (B/Circle): Dash
Right bumper (RB/R1): Throw goo
Start: Pause menu & Instructions

Brain
Left stick: Move cursor
Bottom face button (A/Cross): Activate traps & turrets
